text:
GREEN CHRISTMAS Chloe Green and Jeremy Meeks spend first Christmas as a couple as they post festive selfie

CHLOE Green and Jeremy Meeks have sent their Christmas wishes to their followers as they celebrate their first holiday season today.

The Topshop heiress and the Hot Felon have been inseparable for months, and posting a series of loved-up selfies, it was clear they couldn’t bear to be apart from the holiday season.

While keeping quiet on most social media during the festivities, the pair shared one filtered pic which declared: “Merry Christmas with love from the two of us.”

In the picture, the usually cool and brooding Jeremy is seen beaming next to his other half, who is pouting for the camera.

Their Christmas day together comes shortly after the pair sparked rumours that they were engaged.

Chloe flashed a huge ring on her engagement finger as she walked with Jeremy through the streets of LA shortly before Christmas.

This is despite the fact the 34-year-old is still in the midst of his divorce from first wife, Melissa.

The couple first got together over the summer, but Jeremy and 26-year-old Chloe’s whirlwind romance has been plagued by claims he was a “money-grabber”.

However in a new interview he insisted he would have dated the Topshop heiress even if she wasn’t rich.

Jeremy said: “I’ve never been happier in my life than right now. We’ve found love, we’re in love and we are very happy.

“I love Chloe for her and if she didn’t have a dollar I wouldn’t give a sh*t because we’re so happy.”

Jeremy and Chloe’s relationship became public when they were pictured kissing on a yacht in June.

“I love Chloe for her and if she didn’t have a dollar I wouldn’t give a sh*t because we’re so happy,” he declared.

At the time he was still married to Melissa, who is the mother of his son.
